about.paragraph: Over 3 years of experience as a Fullstack Developer. I've worked on e-commerce payments, multi-country POS platforms with EMV certification, multimodal AI chatbots, agricultural automation with Odoo and multi-supplier inventory. Specialized in API optimization, CI/CD, security (JWT, OWASP) and automated QA.

items.description: Led multi-payment gateway integration in high-volume e-commerce platform, optimizing checkout flows and significantly improving conversion metrics.
achievements: +11% authorization rate integrating Stripe, PayPal, Square, Apple Pay and Google Pay
-18% checkout abandonment with optimized flows and improved UX
350+ automated test cases reducing critical bugs by 40%
-45% p95 latency in tax and discount calculations

items.description: Architected and deployed complex scalable chatbot on Google Cloud Platform using Dialogflow, with Python webhooks, BigQuery analytics and multichannel integration.
achievements: 95% voice recognition accuracy and -60% response time with Dialogflow
1,500+ daily interactions processed with sub-200ms latency on App Engine
Real-time analytics with BigQuery for metrics and automated reports
Multichannel integration WhatsApp Business, Web Chat and Twilio with unified context

items.description: Developed and evolved critical multi-country POS platform with EMV integration, optimizing performance and establishing robust CI/CD pipelines.
achievements: Multi-country POS platform with Angular + Spring Boot
-22% transaction failures with EMV logic in C
Lead time from 3 days to 22h with CI/CD pipelines
-38% p95 latency and -25% JVM memory

items.description: Developed custom Odoo modules for comprehensive agricultural automation, improving operational visibility and optimizing production logistics.
achievements: +60% operational visibility with agricultural management modules
-25% downtime with logistics automation
-35% payroll errors with digitized control
Decisions from 3 days to 24h with centralized reports

items.description: Designed multi-supplier inventory system with complete traceability, granular access control and distribution route optimization.
achievements: -28% stock-outs with multi-supplier inventory
-70% unauthorized access with granular control
-32% order preparation time with automated routes
-54% latency in critical queries (520ms→240ms)

cv.name: Johs Salinas
cv.summary: Fullstack Developer with over 3 years building high-performance transactional platforms, inventory systems, e-commerce and conversational AI solutions. End-to-end experience in Java (Spring Boot / Spring Cloud), JavaScript / TypeScript, Node.js, Python (Odoo), Angular, React, C (embedded POS components), OpenAI APIs (GPT-4.5, Whisper) and PostgreSQL. I have developed multimodal chatbots with 95% voice recognition accuracy, optimized APIs reducing latencies up to 45%, integrated WhatsApp Business and CRM automation (n8n, Make, HubSpot), strengthened security (JWT, OWASP mitigation, input hardening and encryption in transit), and automated CI/CD pipelines with unit, integration, e2e (Cypress / Playwright) testing and >90% coverage. I integrate microservices architectures, caching (Redis), queues, observability and conversational AI to achieve scalable, resilient and auditable systems. Combination of product mindset, technical quality and focus on impact metrics (cost, performance, conversion and AI accuracy).

bullets: Implemented payment gateways Stripe, PayPal, Square, Apple Pay and Google Pay plus credit/debit cards and coupons, increasing authorization rate by +11% and reducing checkout abandonment by 18%.
Orchestrated idempotent payment flow and retries (secure webhooks, fraud validation and method normalization), decreasing reconciliation incidents by 35%.
Designed suite of 350+ test cases (unit, integration, e2e, load, security: SQL/XSS) executed via GitLab CI/CD, lowering critical post-deploy bugs by 40%.
Optimized tax, discount and gift card calculation endpoints (rule layer caching) reducing p95 latency from 420ms to 230ms.
Ensured OWASP best practices compliance (input sanitization, rate limiting, hardened JWT), mitigating automated malicious attempts by 70%.
experiences.specialties: Payment Gateways | Checkout | Performance | Automated QA | Security
experiences.skills: React | TypeScript | Node.js | Stripe | PayPal | Square | Jest | Playwright | CI/CD | Webhooks | OWASP

experiences.focus: Complex scalable chatbot development with GCP and multichannel integrations
bullets: Architected and deployed complex scalable chatbot on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) using Dialogflow for intent modeling, context management and conversational flows, achieving 95% accuracy in voice recognition and -60% response time.
Developed Python 3 webhooks on App Engine implementing advanced business logic, external API integrations and CRM automation, processing 1,500+ daily interactions with sub-200ms p95 latency.

Implemented BigQuery data warehouse for metrics storage, conversation analytics and automated reporting dashboards, enabling real-time monitoring and 4-type multimodal insights (voice, text, image, documents).
Orchestrated multichannel integration (WhatsApp Business Cloud API, Web Chat, Twilio voice) with unified context and state management across channels improving customer experience by 65%.

Designed cloud-native microservices architecture on GCP with Cloud Storage for document management, Firebase for real-time state, and HubSpot CRM automation via n8n/Make pipelines, following Agile/Scrum methodology with CI/CD automated deployments.
experiences.specialties: GCP Chatbot Development | Dialogflow | Python Backend | Multichannel Integration | Cloud-Native Architecture
experiences.skills: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) | Dialogflow | Python 3 | App Engine | BigQuery | Cloud Storage | WhatsApp Business API | Twilio | HubSpot CRM | Firebase | n8n | Make | CI/CD | Microservices | Agile/Scrum

bullets: Built and evolved critical modules (transactions, reconciliation, tokenization) in Angular web platforms and Java/Spring backend connected to multi-country POS terminals.
Integrated firmware and logic in C for EMV validation and pinpad flows, reducing field transaction failures by 22% (p95 retries).
Orchestrated CI/CD pipelines (build, tests, static analysis, deployment) shortening change lead time from 3 days to 22 hours.
Optimized APIs (batching, pooling, selective caching) reducing p95 latency by 38% and JVM memory consumption by 25%.
Implemented security controls (rotating JWT, HSM integration mock, rate limiting, hash signing) raising internal PCI-like compliance to 95%.
experiences.specialties: POS | Secure Transactions | Optimization | CI/CD | Integration
experiences.skills: Java | Spring Boot | Angular | C | JWT | EMV | CI/CD | Optimization | Security

experiences.focus: Agricultural operational automation and production visibility
bullets: Extended Odoo modules in Python for agricultural management (batches, crops, livestock) with sectorized maps and irrigation/harvest calendar, raising operational visibility by 60%.
Automated truck and route logistics planning reducing dispatch downtime by 25% and transport overcosts by 15%.
Implemented payroll and attendance control (validation and consolidation) decreasing manual settlement errors by 35%.
Centralized production and sales records with weekly comparative reports, accelerating decision-making from 3 days to 24h.
Ensured data integrity with migration scripts and tests (fixtures and validations) achieving 0% loss in transition.
experiences.specialties: Agricultural Automation | Logistics | Smart Calendars | Reports
experiences.skills: Python | Odoo | PostgreSQL | Integration | Testing | Maps | Scheduling

experiences.focus: Multi-supplier inventory and distribution with access control
bullets: Designed and developed multi-supplier inventory system (receiving, adjustments, batches and traceability) reducing stock-outs by 28%.
Implemented employee control module (roles, audit, activity) raising transparency and reducing unauthorized access by 70%.
Automated route calculation and wholesale/retail distribution decreasing order preparation times by 32%.
Optimized critical queries (aggregations and filters) with indexes and API layer caching reducing p95 from 520ms to 240ms.
Added e2e tests (Cypress/Playwright) integrated to pipeline reducing post-release incidents by 35%.
experiences.specialties: Inventory | Routes | Access Control | Performance | QA e2e
experiences.skills: React | TypeScript | Node.js | Cypress | Playwright | Optimization | Security

cv.freelance_overview: Under the NexusQA brand I collaborate as a freelancer helping companies and startups accelerate releases, improve performance, automate processes and strengthen quality and security. Open to short and medium-term projects (APIs, payments, inventory, operational platforms and optimization).
cv.freelance_skills: Odoo, Multi-supplier Inventory, API Optimization, Hybrid Data (PostgreSQL/MongoDB), Redis Caching, Logistics Automation, e2e QA, CI/CD, Metrics and monitoring

education.school: Institución Educativa Nuestra Señora De La Presentación

linkedin.headline: Fullstack Engineer | Java, Node.js, Python (Odoo) | Payments, POS, Inventory and Scalability | API Optimization & Automated QA
linkedin.about: Fullstack engineer with over 3 years building payment platforms, POS, inventory, e-commerce and operational automation. I combine Java/Spring and Node.js backend with React/Angular frontend and Python/Odoo to deliver resilient, secure and measurable solutions. I focus on reducing latency, scaling critical modules and raising quality through CI/CD and automated testing (unit, integration, e2e and performance). I enjoy translating business requirements into clean architecture, actionable metrics and fast delivery cycles.
linkedin.value_proposition: I accelerate launches with pragmatic architecture, optimize APIs (up to -45% p95 latency), strengthen security (JWT, OWASP, fraud controls) and enable scalability with caching, metrics and cross-cutting automation.
highlights: +11% authorization rate and -18% checkout abandonment integrating multiple gateways (Stripe, PayPal, Square, Apple Pay, Google Pay).
-38% p95 latency and -25% JVM memory in multi-country POS platform with API and resource level optimizations.
350+ test cases (unit, integration, e2e, security, load) orchestrated via CI/CD decreasing critical bugs by 40%.
Stock-outs -28% with multi-supplier inventory system and batch traceability.
Report generation: 4 min to 50 s consolidating PostgreSQL + MongoDB + Redis + cloud search.
Payroll errors reduction 35% and operational visibility improvement 60% with custom Odoo modules.
Deployment lead time from 3 days to 22 h through end-to-end CI/CD pipelines.
